Elements Voice Series vol.1 Mika Kanai - Wind&Breeze

name: Elements Voice Series vol.1 Mika Kanai - Wind&Breeze
summary: Elements Voice Series vol.1: Mika Kanai - Wind & Breeze (エレメントボイスシリーズ(1) かないみか 〜Wind & Breeze〜) is a CD-ROM-based title for the Playdia console, featuring full motion video of Japanese pop idol Mika Kanai (かないみか).
